words.def: someone in charge of other people
an incidental benefit awarded for certain types of employment (especially if it is regarded as a right)
a Chinese breed of small short-legged dogs with a long silky coat and broad flat muzzle
the financial means whereby one lives
a distinctive odor that is offensively unpleasant
a person who is of equal standing with another in a group
a fencing sword similar to a foil but with a heavier blade
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
